fileheader.author: Erik Hofman, Nikolai V. Chr.
fileheader.note:
This model was created using data that is, or has been, publically available by means of technical reports, textbooks, image graphs or published code. This aircraft description file is in no way related to the manufacturer of the real aircraft. Neither the name of (any of) the authors nor the names of (any of) the manufacturers may be used to endorse or promote products derived from this file.
The data is provided ''as is'' and any express or implied warranties, including, but not limitted to the implied warranties of merchantability and fitness for a particular purpose are disclaimed.

reference.author: Nguyen, L. T.; Ogburn, M. E.; Gilbert, W. P.; Kibler, K. S.; Brown, P. W.; Deal, P. L.
reference.title: Simulator study of stall/post-stall characteristics of a fighter airplane with relaxed longitudinal static stability.

reference.author: Marchand,Michael A
reference.title: Pitch Rate Flight Control for the F-16 Aircraft to Improve Air-To-Air Combat

reference.author: Kassan, Mark W
reference.title: F-16 Simulator for Man-in-the-Loop Testing of Aircraft Control Systems (SIMTACS)

reference.author: Goddard and Lemm
reference.title: Simulation of the F-16 Lantirn Automatic Terrain Avoidance System

reference.author: Gilbert, W. P.; Nguyen, L. T.; Vangunst, R. W.
reference.title: Simulator study of the effectiveness of an automatic control system designed to improve the high-angle-of-attack characteristics of a fighter airplane

reference.author: Dale A. Mackall
reference.title: Development and flight test experiences with a flight-crucial digital control system

reference.author: Elodie Roux
reference.title: Turbofan and Turbojet Engines: Database Handbook

reference.refID: Youtube video showing speed brake actuation time (2 secs)
reference.author: MultiplyLeadership's channel
reference.title: Air-to-air chase video of F-16 AB light off FTT

reference.author: NASA
reference.title: Dynamic ground effects flight test of an F-15 aircraft

reference.author: NASA
reference.title: Dynamic ground effect for a Cranked Arrow Wing Airplane

kinematic.name: fcs/fly-by-wire/yaw/rudder-cmd-norm-kinematic
kinematic.description: Real pedals can not be moved as fast as a joystick. This will limit the movement speed.

switch.name: fcs/fly-by-wire/pitch/g-limit-product
switch.description: The test value is 1.0 on diagram, but anything but 0.5 will give trouble on takeoff as the commanded G rapidly switch for example to double value.

pure_gain.name: fcs/fly-by-wire/pitch/pitch-loop-ground-product
pure_gain.description: diagram say 0.5, but negative makes more sense

summer.name: fcs/fly-by-wire/pitch/int-balance-summer
summer.description: test system not made, so is 0

switch.name: fcs/fly-by-wire/pitch/pitch-rate-lower-switch
switch.description: Is 1.0 or 10 in diagram, but does not make sense to me.

lag_filter.name: fcs/fly-by-wire/pitch/pitch-rate-lower-lag
lag_filter.description: diagram say 0.125, but that does a pitch up for too long after takeoff

fcs_function.name: accelerations/a_n
fcs_function.description:
Page 43: Calc of G-force.
I had some trouble using the Nz, but don't remember what it was.

switch.name: fcs/fly-by-wire/pitch/normal-1-special
switch.description: This prevents NaN to propagate through the system

second_order_filter.name: fcs/fly-by-wire/pitch/pitch-rate-lead-2nd
second_order_filter.description: on old diagram looks to be 2.5, not 2 nor 25

fcs_function.name: fcs/elevator-cmd-deg
fcs_function.description: Not sure if it should be full 25 deg deflection, but can be adjusted as needed. The deadband represent 1.75 lbf stick force as per diagram.

switch.name: fcs/fly-by-wire/pitch/final-cmd
switch.description: Manual Pitch Override. For getting out of deep stall by pitch rocking. This is for F-16, not YF-16. It simulates using MPO switch.

fcs_function.name: fcs/fly-by-wire/pitch/block15-horz-tail-factor
fcs_function.description: Block-15 and above had the horizontal tail surface enlarged by 25% for better control. This data does not factor that in so do it ourselves.

pure_gain.name: fcs/fly-by-wire/tef/tef-pos-norm
pure_gain.description: Using integrator output as mechanical bias should not be feed into aerodynamics

pure_gain.name: fcs/fly-by-wire/tef/tef-pos-deg-hud
pure_gain.description: This value should be displayed in HUD.

function.name: aero/static-margin-c
function.description: Static margin in fraction of chord

function.name: aero/coefficient/CL_g
function.description: Change in lift due to ground effect

function.name: aero/coefficient/Cx
function.description: Cx coefficient in body coordinate system.

function.name: aero/coefficient/dCx_lef
function.description: Cx due to leading edge flaps coefficient.

function.name: aero/coefficient/dCx_sb
function.description:
Cx due speed brake coefficient.
Source: TN-D-8176

function.name: aero/coefficient/Cx_q
function.description: Cx due to pitch rate coefficient.

function.name: aero/coefficient/dCx_q-lef
function.description:
Cx due to pitch rate due to leading edge flaps coefficient.
Source for alpha 50+: TN-D-8176
